channel.title: The Sarcastic Voyage Podcast
channel.description: The Sarcastic Voyage podcast is an expansion of the online “column” (we didn’t have the word “blog” back in those days) that’s been meandering comedically around the internet since 1996. It features audio-based humor from Ron “AAlgar” Watt and is centered around panel discussions which regularly feature AAl’s longtime collaborator, Matt Rowbotham, and a rotating third guest. Almost unbearably nerdy things will be discussed, and lots of Orson Welles references will be made.
channel.generator: Feeder 2.3.1(1625); Mac OS X Version 10.7.3 (Build 11D50b) http://reinventedsoftware.com/feeder/
channel.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
channel.itunes:summary: The Sarcastic Voyage podcast is an expansion of the online “column” (we didn’t have the word “blog” back in those days) that’s been meandering comedically around the internet since 1996. It features audio-based humor from Ron “AAlgar” Watt and is centered around panel discussions which regularly feature AAl’s longtime collaborator, Matt Rowbotham, and a rotating third guest. Almost unbearably nerdy things will be discussed, and lots of Orson Welles references will be made.
channel.itunes:keywords: AAlgar, Rowbotham, Sarcastic, Voyage, Orson, Welles, furries

item.title: Nick & Willikins X-mas Special 2011

item.title: 54 - Emerald City 2010
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Matt and AAl record from Seattle's Emerald City Comic Convention.

item.title: 53 - Cool as Ice
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Travis Holyfield talks internet girlfriends and movies featuring pop stars.

item.title: 52 - We Love You, Barefoot Bandit!
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Voiceguy Dave joins Matt and AAl for another listener mail show.

item.title: 51 - The AXE COP Guy
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: AAl and Matt speak with Ethan Nicolle, artist and co-creator of web sensation AXE COP.

item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: As the show reaches its first meaningless milestone, we take a look back at how it got here.

item.title: 49 - *sigh*
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Writer/artist Michael Kupperman (of Tales Designed to Thrizzle, Adult Swim and the New Yorker) talks to AAl and Matt for an hour. We can’t believe it either.

item.title: 48 - Valumtimes!
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: An assortment of ladies discuss their imaginary boyfriends.

item.title: 47 - Ghostbusters
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Adrian Bachnivsky discusses ghosts and ghostbusting.

item.title: 46 - Frolic on the Toilet
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Pete Lenz discusses gaming on the Nintendo DS and drinking enough Throwback soda to give yourself diabetes.

item.title: 45 - The Worst We Can Find
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Lauri (AAl's ex-wife, so you know she must have SOME sense) stops by to discuss terrible movies. Pat Loika, Annie Ladner and Dewey Bass also make appearances. It's a star-studded extravaganza, unlike the actual movies we're talking about!

item.title: 44 - Paris, Milan, Whalley and Beav
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Rob Humphreys stops by to discuss... all sorts of things that might get us sued or arrested. You'll just have to listen.

item.title: 43 - I Wants to Beat Up Mouses
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: We hold Flonk down for 90 minutes and make him answer stupid questions from a bunch of other people. See what we did there?

item.title: 42 - Don't Panic
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: "Icelander" author Dustin Long discusses Douglas Adams, Cerebus and his own book.

item.title: 41 - Buffy the Dracula Slayer
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Sabrina Rasmussen shows up to discuss Buffy and Angel. But then we run out of time before we get to the Angel part.

item.title: 40 - Chariots of the Pods?
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Maria Bustillos, author of Dorkismo: Macho of the Dork, discusses her book, her thoughts on Avatar and dorks in general.

item.title: 39 - Verboten part 2: Star Wars
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Dewey Bass stops by to discuss Star Wars.

item.title: 38 - Season Premiere
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: First Q&A show of 2010.

item.title: 37 - Verboten part 1: The Simpsons
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: AAl, Matt and Chris Page discuss The Simpsons.

item.title: 36 - Clusterflonk part 4
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: The last of the Flonk questions! Also the final show of the year. Matt and AAl wrap things up for 2009.

item.title: 35 - Star Trek: Deep Space Nine
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: AAl, Matt and Amanda discuss the greatest of all Treks: Deep Space Nine.

item.title: 34 - Clusterflonk part 3
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Show 3 of 4 in which AAl and Matt speak to a ton of people — some former guests, some new to the show — in an attempt to make the Flonk questions go away.

item.title: 33 - Star Trek: The Next Generation
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Star Trek show 2 of 3, as AAl and Matt welcome Dave Fields and Ed Casey to discuss Picard, Riker and those other guys.

item.title: 32 - Clusterflonk part 2
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Show 2 of 4 in which we speak to a number of people — some former guests, many speaking with us for the first time — and attempt to work our way through these Flonk questions.

item.title: 31 - Star Trek: The Original Crew
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: AAl and Matt welcome "Irish Gav" Brown and Mark "Bob" Boszko to discuss Star Trek for a really, REALLY long time.

item.title: 30 - Clusterflonk part 1
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: The first of four (FOUR?!) "clip shows" in which a number of people - previous guests and new voices - help us work through the massive pile of Flonk questions.

item.title: 29 - Back to the Future
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Mark “Bob” Boszko discusses Back to the Future in the show’s first specific topic-based show.

item.title: 28 - Vampire Stalin
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Vampirologist Irene Peinhopf discusses what she knows best.

item.title: 27 - BLANDY.
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Army Specialist Blandy Buchanan discusses comics and pooping.

item.title: 26 - A Casual Renaissance Faire
item.description: "The Superior Lynch" (Flonk's brother, Brian) shows up to discuss audiobooks, AAl's forthcoming wedding and, yes, Renaissance Faires. Huzzah!
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham

item.title: 25 - I Smell Burnt Toast
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Chris Page discusses being an alcoholic and a Dr. House lookalike.

item.title: 24 - Like a Whale
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Noted sexpert Heather Andresen shares her sexpertise.

item.title: 23 - Everyone's Irish Forever
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Artist Dewey Bass discusses his webcomic, Spider-Man and lycanthropy.

item.title: 22 - F for Cake
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Amanda (AAl's fiancée and Matt's best friend) makes an appearance. She has a hat. Apparently.

item.title: 21 - You Done Libeled My Pants
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Tony Palermo, he of the Any o'Clock Shadow, discusses swearing in front of children, turning forty and his former neighbor Shirtless D.

item.title: 20 - Moments of Mustache Doubt
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Webcomic artist extraordinaire Corwin discusses mustaches, Jack Kirby and Venture Bros.

item.title: 19 - Halloween Spooktacular
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Another girl! Annie Ladner discusses paper pants, terrible fonts and Halloween.

item.title: 18 - Toe Thumbs
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Another all listener mail show!

item.title: 17 - Larry the Cable Guy Should Die in a Fire
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Two (TWO?!) guests this week, from the United Kingdom: the oft-mentioned English Gav and Irish Gav. Anglophilia is discussed, and alcohol is consumed. Lots of delicious alcohol.

item.title: 16 - Pod Damn It, Matt!
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Kevin Lynch (aka Flonk) finally makes it on, after many attempts to compensate for the World's Worst Microphone™.

item.title: 15 - Tanooki Kabuki
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: José Baez stops by to discuss video games and mustache rides.

item.title: 14 - Erotic Grotesque Nonsense
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Angel Robinson sums up the SVP in a word — in Japanese, no less — and discusses what it's like being the only woman in the comic shop.

item.title: 13 - Loika Rock
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Much-beloved comic writer/artist Pat Loika discusses the comics industry and reveals just how much he knows about Shake Hands with Danger (turns out it's quite a lot!)

item.title: 12 - F--- Martin Short
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: As promised, podcast 12 deals with AAl's hatred of Martin Short. Also, your mail is answered. Yes, YOURS.

item.title: 11 - Mr. B Awesome
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Adrian Bachnivsky stops in to discuss internet negativity, having a movie theater all to yourself and the underappreciated art of knocking guys into bottomless pits.

item.title: 10 - The Black Priest Rules All
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: This week's guest, Sabrina Rasmussen, has the distinction of not only being somebody Matt went to school with — instead of that show-off AAl for a change — but also being the first actual female to appear on the show. This is show 3 of 3 recorded at the 2009 Penny Arcade eXpo (PAX).

item.title: 09 - Vulcan Boy Fights
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Show 2 of 3 recorded at the 2009 Penny Arcade eXpo (PAX) features Ed Casey. Star Trek is discussed, and Ed attempts to get the guys into his shower. For... recording. Apparently.

item.title: 08 - Titmoe
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Show 1 of 3 recorded at the 2009 Penny Arcade eXpo (PAX). Legendary titmoe Mark Darin stops by to brag about writing Monkey Island™.

item.title: 07 - God is a F---
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Yet another one of AAl’s talented, exploitable friends from high school, Jason Ellis, stops by to discuss nerdcore music, the tail he isn’t growing and the supervillain that disrupted his wedding.

item.title: 06 - AAlgar's Donuts
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Comic book artist Scott Ziolko stops by to demand something he was allegedly promised by AAl on Twitter.

item.title: 05 - F--- Andy Panda
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: AAl and Matt’s scheduled guest runs into some technical difficulties, so they fill the time answering some listener mail.

item.title: 04 - Fourthcast
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Chris “Fourthman” Coleman is a standup comic and a guy who is way smarter than either Matt or AAl. He wanted to talk about “bad comedy,” so he came to the SV podcast. HIlarity ensues.

item.title: 03 - Gin.
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: Mark “Bob” Boszko shows up for a second (first) time and discusses, among other things, Females for Hire, AAl’s grandma Jimmy Carter and, of course, gin. Lots and lots of gin.

item.title: 02 - The Great Felt Wars
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: A panel discussion with Dave Fields (the soothing voice of the SV podcast) involving a brilliant shark-related anecdote, shaking hands with danger and felt. Lots and lots of felt. (Note: we know the levels are a bit weird and apologize for that. The problem will be corrected in future installments.)

item.title: 01 - Just This Once, All the Jokes Explained
item.itunes:author: Ron "AAlgar" Watt, Matt Rowbotham
item.itunes:summary: An introduction to AAl and Matt, and what you can expect from the forthcoming critically acclaimed, award-winning Sarcastic Voyage podcast.
